title: Resident Privileges
seo_title: Resident Privileges | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: A nightly Residents Fee of $49 plus tax per adult is conveniently added to your folio and covers a vast array of bespoke, and unlimited, InResidence privileges:
contents:
A nightly Residents Fee of $49.99 plus tax per adult is conveniently added to your folio and covers a vast array of bespoke, and unlimited, InResidence privileges:

  • Sweet and savory breakfast presentations, weekdays 6:30-10:30 AM, weekend 7-11 AM, on The Terrace, located on the 23rd floor
  • Barista bar and non-alcoholic beverages available all day, in The Terrace
  • Hours of Indulgence, light fare and curated selection of alcoholic beverages served daily from 5-7 PM in The Terrace
  • High-speed Wi-Fi access
  • Local and toll-free phone calls
  • 24-hour Fitness Center, on the 3rd floor
  • 24-hour business center services
  • Bottled water in-room

**Please note, this fee is not inclusive of service gratuities.

At a place where art, fashion and design are celebrated at every turn, complimentary services and facilities at WestHouse Hotel New York include:

  • Concierge services, available to create custom itineraries or confirm special appointments and reservations
  • ADA accessible 24-hour workout room with personal trainers on request; for more information, please view our Accessibility Statement.
  • Signature scent, Our House, crafted by ambient specialist 12.29 enhances the aura of elegant familiarity
  • In-room check-out service
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Evening turndown, on request
  • Overnight shoe shine, on request
  • In-room beauty service, on request
  • Valets and luggage unpacking, on request
  • ADA accessible bedrooms and suites
